episodes.title: How Cults Suck People In
episodes.description:
Cult leaders are the masters of manipulation, able to suck in seemingly normal people to exert control over their members. Why are cult leaders so effective at getting obedience from their members? What makes someone vulnerable to getting sucked into a cult? And once in a cult, how can you get out of it? This video explores the psychology of cults, manipulation, and obedience.

Follow me on Instagram:
@dravivaphilippmuller http://tinyurl.com/4a5xfej2
